Video widget: provide a video container¶

Video widget: provide a video container

Warning

Library avbin is needed for using MTVideoPlayer. Check http://code.google.com/p/avbin/ for more information.

class pymt.ui.widgets.videowidget.MTVideo(**kwargs)¶

Bases: pymt.ui.widgets.scatter.MTScatterWidget

MTVideo is a video player, implemented in top of MTScatterWidget. You can use it like this

video = MTVideo(video='source_file')
Parameters:
video : str

Filename of video
